title: The autobiography and letters of Mrs. M.O.W. Oliphant /
author: Oliphant
snippet: About the ghost story, I am turning it over in my mind, and' if I find it likely to work out well, you shall have it in good time. The idea of the story of the Unseen called " The Open Door" was suggested to Mrs Oliphant by part of the grounds belonging to Colinton House, near Edinburgh, where Mr Blackwood was then residing. WINDSOR, 20'th December...I am very glad' that Mr Langford likes "The Open Door," and delighted that you are satisfied with your New Year number.
